sentences.english: The handicapped also include deaf - mutes and some brain paralysis amentia .
sentences.chinese: 残疾人还包括聋哑人及部分脑瘫智障患者。

sentences.english: Another study at Duke is accepting young children who have what is called spastic cerebral palsy.
sentences.chinese: 另一项研究是在杜克接受谁有所谓痉挛性脑瘫的儿童。

sentences.english: Bill Porter is a 65-year-old Portlander with cerebral palsy.
sentences.chinese: 波特是一位患有脑瘫的波特兰老人。

sentences.english: Strabismus and amblyopia were the commonest eye diseases.
sentences.chinese: 斜视和弱视是脑瘫儿童最常见的眼部疾病。

sentences.english: He's more concerned about spilled cereal than having a brain-damaged child.
sentences.chinese: 看来比起有个脑瘫的孩子来说，丫更在意丫的麦片。

sentences.english: Comprehensive functional assessment before and after the treatment was performed.
sentences.chinese: 治疗前后依据脑瘫儿童综合功能评定表进行疗效评定。

sentences.english: The effect of acupuncture therapy on the recovery of movement function in the children with spastic diplegia was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 探讨针刺疗法对小儿痉挛型脑瘫运动功能恢复的影响。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the efficacy of acupuncture in ataxia children with cerebral palsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨针刺疗法治疗共济失调型脑瘫的疗效。

sentences.english: Family physiotherapy is an effective method for cerebral palsy in children.
sentences.chinese: 家庭物理治疗是一种有效的脑瘫治疗方法。

sentences.english: Conclusion The treatment of outside fixer to brain paralysis convulsive equinovarus is easy and effective.
sentences.chinese: 结论外固定架治疗脑瘫性马蹄足方法简便，疗效确切。

sentences.english: He has cerebral palsy and has already had seven operations to unbend his arms and legs.
sentences.chinese: 他得了脑瘫，并接受了7次手术以矫正四肢。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the treatment of Brain paralysis convulsive equinovarus.
sentences.chinese: 目的改良脑瘫痉挛性马蹄足的治疗方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the gait characteristics of spastic diplegia cerebral palsy children.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究双侧痉挛型脑瘫患儿的步态特征。

sentences.english: Furthermore, this decline was attributed to a reduction in the bilateral subtype of CP.
sentences.chinese: 而且这种下降是由双侧痉挛性脑瘫发病率减少导致的。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of wrist hand orthoses on cerebral palsy children with adduction of thumb.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察腕手矫形器治疗脑瘫患儿拇指内收的效果。

sentences.english: Methods The gaits of 26 spastic diplegia cerebral palsy children were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法对26例痉挛型脑瘫患儿进行步态分析。

definition: paralysis of one side of the body/hemiplegia
disabled/handicapped/deformity on a person or animal
to contract (an illness)/to be afflicted with/to suffer from
